text: The Moody Church (often mistakenly referred to as Moody Memorial Church) is a historic Protestant (Christian) church in the Lincoln Park neighborhood of Chicago, Illinois. Construction began in 1924 and completed 1 year later, with dedication of the building on November 8, 1925. The covering area is 140 feet by 225 feet. ==Other websites== *The Moody Church *The Moody Church's history website *Moody Church Media Resource Library *Information from the Billy Graham Center's Archive Category:Evangelicalism Category:Churches in Chicago Category:1925 establishments in Illinois
title: Moody Church
